topic.title: A lot of weird errors - anybody encountered any of those too?
topic.body:
ZeroNet keeps writing these error messages to log:
[2020-03-12 21:18:10,596] ERROR Ui.UiServer Error 500: UiWSGIHandler error: BrokenPipeError: Broken pipe

Is this a bug? Or I can somehow fix this one?

1583980969_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdo.body: Heh, technically I am, practically I'm not. I love my virtual anime girlfriend :3

> [nekololi](#comment_437_1FzZsDQdh8wk71bDLxURPzmAt2FXehoNAB): im incapable of being attracted to anyone over the age of 12. im not sure how im supposed to be anything but single.

Move to a country where pedophilia is allowed

> [bigbadbob](#comment_998_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): I would love to hear a woman's perspective on why she is single... but it might be too much of a touchy subject for to address.  Hope to hear some.

There are no girls on the internets, bigbadbob

And there certainly are no girls on the zeronet

1584033612_1LgMfbn4Sv1jxzq8oZFyMi9m6kfEU.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_1230_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Did you have these errors beforehand, on previous ZeroNet versions?

I only installed ZeroNet today, I never had any versions before.
Holy that's a lot of posts.
